channel.title: Entertainment
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Entertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What Prince William Learned from His Royal Childhood — and How He's Changing Things for George, Charlotte and Louis
item.description: The Prince and Princess of Wales are united in wanting to ensure the most normal life as possible

item.title: Andy Cohen's Son Ben, 6, Dresses as Darth Vader for Halloween After Telling His Dad He 'Hated the Ending' of “Star Wars”

item.title: Arcade Fire's Win Butler and Régine Chassagne Separate After 22 Years of Marriage and Hint at the Future of the Band
